Shadow Star salutes and goes to Talon.

Shadow Star:  Prepare for landing.

OOC: I wasn't sure what you wanted him to do.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> Tyrael laughs. Surprisingly, it is not the kind of
> cruel laugh he let 
> go when he executed Gorefeast.
> 
> Tyrael: Ah yes! That would probably place us near
> their heart! I think 
> that for now, we will announce us as a neutral group
> and place 
> ourselves in a position where we can strike at the
> Predacons hard and 
> fast! (He glances at his timer) Naga should come out
> of CR soon enough 
> and we must be on orbit by now. I think that we
> should land. I will 
> leave you command of the landing, lieutenant. They
> are your troops 
> too, after all. Meet us on the bridge when you are
> ready.
> 
> He comes out of the room and heads back to the
> bridge.
